definition[0]: to help a plan, idea, feeling etc to develop
example[0]: European union is an ideal that has been nurtured since the post-war years.
example[1]: a hatred of foreigners nurtured by the media
definition[1]: to feed and take care of a child or a plant while it is growing
definition[2]: the education and care that you are given as a child, and the way it affects your later development and attitudes
